name: Baldi's Cool School Testing Demo
description: This is a new Baldi decompile, i am making, it's WIP so don't expect to see a super well made mod. ANYWAYS, this contain a little of BB+ Stuff but it's not that much, a bunch of updates will come! If you saw a bug/error just report it in the comments section! If you want, you can sumbit a fanart for the art gallery of the game! It'll show up there.
